name: ADGP110
body:
### Rory Vaughn's Year 1 Assessments

![League](http://36646d87786feafc0611-0338bbbce19fc98919c6293def4c5554.r0.cf1.rackcdn.com/images/FiGZ9r3D3E82.878x0.Z-Z96KYq.jpg)

My name is Rory Vaughn, and I am currently a student at The Academy of Interactive Entertainment in Lafayette. Work that I feel is relevant for other people to see will be posted here from now until the end of my second year at the college. This page will serve as a portfolio for my programming career until I become more familiar with the HTML and CSS coding languages (in order to create my own website).

### Assessments
This site was created during the ADGP110 assessment and will include every assessment from now til graduation.
### Author's and Contributors
The site is managed by Rory Vaughn, however was created with the setup of the Github website.


### Contact
If there or any questions or you simply need to contact me, you can reach my at my email address, "Rvaughn2525@gmail.com"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
